details.title: free eye
details.label: Advertising  and Marketing
details.desc:
المعارض والمؤتمرات 
  			
  				تقوم الشركة على تنظيم وإدارة المعارض بأحدث تقنيات صناعة المعارض من حيث التنظيم والإدارة والخدمات المرافقة كما في ذلك تقديم الدراسات والإستشارات والإقتراحات لإعداد خطة تنظيم المعارض . ولضمان نجاح المعرض وتحقيق الأهداف المرجوة منه يتطلب كفاءة عالية في : التخطيط ← التنظيم ← الإعداد ← التنفيذ ← المتابعة من القائمين عليه
  		
  		
  			
  				التصوير التجاري 
  			
  				التصوير التجاري هو السلاح الأكثر إقناعا في تسويق عملك. في تصوير المنتجات الترويجية، فري آي هي الوسيلة المتاحة لتلبية احتياجات التصوير الفوتوغرافي من الشركات، الكبيرة والصغيرة. من خلق صورة جانبية لاستخدام شبكة الإنترنت والإعلانات، والتقارير السنوية وقصص المجلة، ونحن نأخذ أقصى درجات الحذر لخلق الصور المبتكرة التي تتجاوز توقعات عملائنا.
  		
  		
  			
  				تصميم جرافيك 
  			
  				بالنسبة لنا الرسم والتصميم الاعلاني هو الأساس الذي يمكننا من الـتواصل كما هو الحال في جميع الاتصالات، وذلك باستخدام نفس الكلمات التي ليست مهمة بقدر ما يتحدثون بنفس لغتهم لذلك ما نقوم به بأولى عملية لعملنا هو الاستماع والـتركيز على عملائـنا. فهم احتـياجاتهم وأهداف العملاء الشخصية ومساعدتهم، على تمييز أنفسهم عن منافسيهم
  		
  		
  			
  				تصميم وإستضافة المواقع الإلكترونية 
  			
  				إن فري آي لديها من الخبرة ما يلزم لتطوير مواقع انترنت قوية وتستقطب عدد كبير من الزوار، وتعطي العملاء المرونة التي يحتاجونها لتحقيق أهدافهم التسويقية
  		
  		
  			
  				الدعاية 
  			
  				تعبت من البحث عن مواقع تعلن فيها عن موقعك ويكون زواره كثير وذات شريحة متخصصة ، تعبت من المواقع المزيفة ذات الأعضاء والردود الإجبارية وتريد موقع ذا ترتيب عالي في محركات البحث ، تعبت من انتظار مردود إعلاناتك وتبادلك للإعلان في بعض المواقع ، تعبت من انتظار النجاح وبدا موقعك في الذبول و الموت ، فنحن في انتر تو شوب سوف نعيد الحياة إلى موقعك والنشاط بأذن الله وإشهاره في اكبر محركات البحث وتنظيم دعايتك الالكترونية
  		
  		
  			
  				الإعلان 
  			
  				هناك الكثير من الطرق للإعلان ولكل طريقة خاصيتها وتميزها وفعاليتها وهي علي التالي : الإعلان عن طريق البنرات في المواقع الإعلان عن طريق رسائل الإيميل الإعلان عن طريق رسائل الجوال الاعلانات النصية في المواقع الكبيرة الاعلان في محركات البحث المشهورة إعلانات الفلاش والفيديو في المواقع الكبيرة الاعلانات عن طريق الجروبات
  		
  		
  			
  				التسويق 
  			
  				لديك منتج جديد وتريد تعريف الناس فيه ، لديك تخفيضات موسميه أو سنوية وتريد الإعلان لها ، لديك مناسبة افتتاح فرع جديد أو مناسبة مرور سنوات على افتتاح مؤسستك أو شركتك أو فرعك وذلك من خلال الكثير من القنوات أي كان نشاطك الذي ترغب الإعلان والدعاية له فنحن في مركز انتر تو شوب جاهزين لذلك ، يساعدك خبرائنا الإعلانيين لإدارة حملتك التسويقية مستعينين بأفضل الوسائـل التقنية والبرمجية ، مما يساعد على تسويق منتجاتكم أو خدماتكم في أسرع وقت ممكن لجمهور ضخم من خلال شبكة الانترنت
  		
  		
  			
  				الحملات الإعلانية Advertising campaign 
  			
  				هي سلسلة من الإعلانات المختلفة أو إعلان واحد في واحدة أو أكثر من وسائل الإعلام ، يجمعها هدف واحد وتستهدف جمهوراً محدداً وتقوم على امتداد فترة زمنية قد تطول أو تقصر على حسب هدف الشركة من هذه الحملة ، وغالباً تستخدم التكرار والخطاب الإعلاني المكثف لتحقيق هدف الشركة من هذه الحملة والذي قد يكون طرح منتج جديد أو تعزيز صورة أو مبيعات منتج قديم أو للعمل على تغيير أو تدعيم صورة الشركة والمنتج في أذهان الجمهور المستهدف من إعلانها

details.label: Advertising  and Marketing
details.desc: Gulf Media Company is one of the largest providers of integrated turnkey media solutions in the Gulf Region for establishing, generating, managing, and allocating high-end media related affairs. Our market segments are divided among governmental ministries of information, private channels and studios, broadcasting networks, producers, gigantic private media libraries, and high-tech advertising agencies. Slowly but surely Gulf Media dominated the Gulf market in the field of film restoration and archiving due to its tactical panning and its high expertise effort in this field of interest. With a battery of professionals Gulf Media is planning insistently to expand through the MENA Region in the soon future.

groups.title: Products & Services
groups.content: Our fields of interest vary among the following subsidiaries:        * establishment of Radio & TV Studios, taking into consideration the building design association, IT & Network  Infrastructure, lighting systems, Furniture designs, cabling & wiring, communication systems and performance systems.      * Film restoration, taking into consideration cleaning functions, rejuvenating functions, polishing functions, and editing processes.      * Archiving Functions, taking into consideration the IT & Infrastructure, Video & Audio systems and editing systems.      * Broadcasting Services, taking into consideration Radio & Video broadcasting systems, Steady Radio & Video broadcasting in Studios and Mobile Broadcasting in Outdoors Broadcasting Vans (OB Vans) with HD cameras from 6 cameras to 14 cameras, transmitters, mobile metering, signal monitoring and rebroadcasting.      * High-end advertising, taking into consideration HD LED Video displays (indoors & outdoors), lightning systems, mesh curtains, video walls and escalated advertising.

details.title: Kuwait Aviation Services Company (kasco)
details.label: Aviation
details.desc: In the early 1980’s, kuwait airways identified a need for separate company to undertake many of its ground handling functions. in addition, the provision of a flight kitchen operating to first class international standards at Kuwait International Airport was seen as essential for the future growth of the airport. Kuwait Airways therefore established in 1981 a wholly owned subsidiary kuwait aviation services company (kasco) - to meet these needs. The kitchen established by kasco was only the first brick that has grown bit by bit into such a huge company designed especially to meet the needs of its customers. today, after twenty years of operation, In addition to its flight kitchen, kasco is operating kuwait international airport’s restaurants and cafeterias, supervising the first class and business class lounges, overseeing v.v.i.p. services, and managing the food and beverage operation of the airport transit hotel.

companies.name: NSS Kuwait elected their Vanitha Samajam Members for year 2011-12

details.title: NSS Kuwait elected their Vanitha Samajam Members for year 2011-12
details.label: Community and Societies
details.desc:
NSS-Kuwait Vanitha Samajam elected new office bearers
   
  NSS-KUWAIT held its Vanitha Samajam meeting on 14th May 2011 at Rythm Auditorium, Abbassiya and elected its new office bearers for the year 2011 - 2012. Presided by NSS-Kuwait President, the meeting highlighted by its overwhelming participation of its Vanitha members from all areas of Kuwait.
  
  Shanthi Venugopal was unanimously elected as the new Vanitha Samajam Convener and Mily Nair and Kumari Balakrishnan were elected as the Joint Conveners.
  
  The new Area Coordinators also were elected in the meeting and accordingly, Dina Prasad, Sandya Gopakumar and Reshma Rajesh (Abbassiya), Nidhi Rajeev, Bindu Anil Kumar, Dhanya Anil (Farwaniya), Dr. Anitha G Nair and Asha Rajeev (Salmiya) and Suseela Ramachandran, Reshma Sabu (Abu-Halifa, Mangaf, Fahaheel) are the new Area Coordinators.
  
  An action plan for 2011 - 2012 activities were drafted at the meeting. Shanthi Venugopal had called for all NSS-Kuwait Vanitha Samajam members to come forward to participate in all its activities and requested their support and co-operation for the successful functioning of the Vanitha Samajam.
  
  The welcome address was given by Suresh Nair, NSS-Kuwait General Secretary and Kumari Balakrishnan, Joint Convener delivered the vote of thanks.

Scouting was officially founded in 1952 and by 1955, Kuwait Scouts were recognized by the World Bureau (WOSM).
  
  Kuwait Scouting features out-of-school education in character development, skills and traditions and clean living.
  
  Community service projects include participation in environmental services, World Health Day and conducting youth work camps. Scouts also assist several charitable organizations in co-operative activities.
  
  The Scouts have also offered considerable aid and assistance to other Scout organizations in the Gulf area.
  
  Membership is 6,061 registered Scouts in 1998

details.title: Kuwait General Administration of Customs
details.label: Government
details.desc: The General Administration of Customs founded in the era of the late Sheikh Mubarak Al-Sabah in 1899. It’s considered as the first governmental department established in Kuwait,   The General Administration of Customs is the party that handle all customs business work, and also execute all decisions issued from country’s ministries and governmental organizations.  Also it can be considered as the first line defender to protect country’s security an economy from the covetous and who has criminal manners and who aim to violate laws. The General Administration of Customs while performing it’s huge responsibilities also execute all laws, decisions and regulations issued from official organizations as an executive organization. Once these laws and regulations are being provided to the administration, all required circulars sent to documentary administrations to execute all decisions according to workflow systems.

details.title: United Oil Projects Co.
details.label: Industries
details.desc: The Chemical Division of United Oil Projects Company (UOP), specializing in the production and marketing of high quality synthetic resins for the coatings, inks, adhesives and composite industries. Standing on a 28,000 m2 plot in the Mina Abdullah industrial area, KCMC's ISO 9001 and ISO 14001 certified plant has a production capacity of 10,000 metric tonnes per year and is one of the most modern self-contained facilities of its' type in the Middle East.

groups.title: Products & Services
groups.content: ntroduction    The Chemical Division of United Oil Projects Company (UOP), specializing in the production and marketing of high quality synthetic resins for the coatings, inks, adhesives and composite industries. Standing on a 28,000 m2 plot in the Mina Abdullah industrial area, KCMC's ISO 9001 and ISO 14001 certified plant has a production capacity of 10,000 metric tonnes per year and is one of the most modern self-contained facilities of its' type in the Middle East.    Technology    Originally producing commodity resins based on imported technology, over the past 5 years KCMC has successfully developed its own product range by taking full cognisance of customer specified requirements for coating application and performance under diverse environmental conditions.    Quality    We are proud recipients of ISO 9001:2008 and firmly believe our product quality conforms to that of major international resin suppliers.    Environment    Our ISO 14001:2004 certification exhibits our long term commitment to reducing the environmental impact of the company’s operations.    Objective    Our number one objective is to be internationally recognised as a supplier of quality resins for the coatings industry with business partners rather than simply customers.    Why KCMC?    With global acquisitions of one company by another being an everyday occurrence, available technology is shrinking, rather than growing, as product lines become rationalized for the sake of economy of scale. Although KCMC is undoubtedly a minor player on the global market we believe that this provides us with a number of distinct advantages:    1. We utilise our extensive experience to rapidly design products to meet specific customer requirements without the requirement for large ‘economy of scale’ production volumes. This in turn allows coating manufactures to produce niche products in increasingly competitive markets.         2. Our technology is constantly reviewed and renewed based on R&D initiatives. We do not persistently offer 40 year old technology in an evolving market.         3. Customer sales and technical service are conducted with real people, no automated online queries or orders that get lost on the Web.    Give KCMC products a try; you have nothing to lose and everything to gain

groups.title: Products & Services
groups.content:
ABG Engineering Division is specialized in project development, civil works, procurement services, and architectural finishing; through its integrated array of pre-construction and construction services, ABG Engineering serves the residential, commercial, hospitality and recreational market sectors.    	    	ABG is one of the emerging Engineering & Construcion Company in the Middle East, with an established leadership position in Kuwait, and an expanding global partnership. A strong, customer- focused approach and the constant quest for top class quality have enabled the company to attain and sustain leadership in its major lines of business.
  	     	    	At ABG, Our capabilities together with our extensive inventory ensure that we can support clients' product needs from initial project phase right through to completion. Every facet of our service is supplemented with • Superior Technical knowledge • Top-end equipment and • Responsive customer service. Every customer, regardless of how large or small, receives the same careful attention to detail and quality that have become synonymous with ABG.   									TransCar is the perfect solution for transporting large quantity items between centralized functions such as kitchens, laundries and storerooms.
  									TransCar efficiently and silently delivers and retrieves:  								  									  										Meals/soiled dishes,  									  										Clean & soiled linen,  									  										Trash, supplies,  									  										Surgical cases and  									  										Bulk pharmaceuticals  								  							  						  					  				  			  			  				  			  				  					  						  							  								  									PTS (Pneumatic Tube System)  								  									The pneumatic delivery is a transportation medium with future, because it carried rapidly and surely and offers many important advantages. companies.name: Kuwait Petroleum Company - Bunker Sales Department

details.title: Kuwait Petroleum Company - Bunker Sales Department
details.label: Oil Gas And Petrochemical
details.desc:
Founded in 1980 as an umbrella organisation to manage the State of Kuwait's rapidly diversifying oil interests, KPC has in less than two decades established itself as a truly international entity, respected by governments and business institutions worldwide as the ambassador of Kuwait's business industry. Today the KPC Group encompasses the following companies:
  
  Kuwait Oil Company (KOC)
  Manages the exploration and the production of oil and gas inside Kuwait. 
  Kuwait National Petroleum Company (KNPC)
  Responsible for refining, liquified gas operations and the marketing of petroleum products within Kuwait. 
  Petrochemical Industries Company (PIC)
  Responsible for producing and marketing fertilizers and petrochemicals. 
  Kuwait Oil Tankers Company (KOTC)
  Manages the transport operations of crude oil, petroleum products and liquified gases. 
  The Kuwait Aviation Fuelling Company (KAFCO)
  Responsible for supplying aeroplanes with fuel at Kuwait International Airport. 
  The International Marketing Department of KPC
  Controls the marketing and sales of crude oil petroleum products and liquified petroleum gases (KPG) outside Kuwait. 
  In pursuit of its objectives of diversification and flexibility, KPC expanded its foreign operations to include:
  
  Kuwait Foreign Petroleum Exploration Company (KUFPEC)
  Responsible for overseas oil and gas exploration and exploitation. 
  Kuwait Petroleum International (KPI)
  Runs the downstream acquisitions in Europe that have effectively made KPC a fully integrated operation from well-head to petrol pump.

details.title: الوسيط العقاري الكويتي
details.label: Real Estate
details.desc:
نعمل عبر موقعنا thegulfcity.com للوصول إلى الريادة في مجال الوساطة العقارية عبر الانترنت، وذلك بإستغلال خبراتنا التقنية والتسويقية للجمع بين البائع والمشتري لإتمام صفقة عقارية ناجحة.
   
  فقد تم تصميم الموقع وفق معايير جودة عالية تتيح للمستخدم، سواء كان بائع او مشتري، سهوله التعامل مع أدوات الموقع.
   
  حيث نقوم بتزويد الباحثين عن عقار بمعلومات تفصيلية عن كافة العقارات المدرجة في موقعنا من خلال وسائل البحث وغيرها من الوسائل المتاحة في الموقع.
                    
  ومن جهه اخرى، فإننا نوفر لبائعي وملاك العقارات، أفراد أو شركات، أفضل وأسهل الوسائل لإدراج عقاراتهم وإدارتها مباشرة في موقعنا. هذا اضافة الى ادراج الشركات المشاركة في الموقع ضمن دليل الشركات العقارية، والذي من خلاله يتم انشاء صفحة خاصة للشركة تحتوي على بيانات الشركة والعقارات الخاصة فيها.

details.desc:
Al-Salem International Company (ASIC) provides a worldwide network for all your roadand air freight needs. With a wide range of services, supported by our preferred carriers, we offer you the flexibility between standardised connections with fixed schedules or air charter. 
  
  A core element of our freight management service offering is the ability to move single or complex shipments by air or road, at any time and to any destination.
  
  ASIC capabilities include:
  Airport-to-Airport
  Door-to-Airport
  Door-to-Door
  Consolidation
  Time-defined Services
  Customs clearance
  Document preparation
  
  Road Transportation:
  ASIC operates an integrated road transport network for any door-to-door deliveries. We use couriers which include vehicles featuring both temperature-controlled and dual compartment refrigeration, ASIC caters to the distribution and supply chain needs of local, regional and international manufacturers, distributors and retailers from a diverse range of industries.

groups.content: • Shipping Agency - Attending to Liner/Roro/General/Feeder Vessels at all ports in Kuwait and Iraq with quick berthing, swift loading / discharging operation and prompt demurrage free turn-around. Also assist owners with crew change, clearing & delivery of ships spares, stores, mail and provisions round the clock 7 days of the week.    • NVOCC - Handling of all types of NVOCC-SOC containers at all ports in Kuwait and Iraq from feeder vessels / smooth haulage to all ICD in Iraq and quick turn-around of containers for mixed destinations with minimum layover period.    • FCL / LCL Groupage Containers - both export & import containers are handled on behalf of Consolidators with emphasis on providing a trouble free service to clients. "TCS“ supports its principals & other service partners with effective canvassing to secure cargo leads, bookings, routing orders, and nominations. "TCS“ also provides up to date information on shipping & cargo movements including in-depth market and competition analysis. Kuwait groupage containers can be handled at our warehouse facility in Kuwait free trade zone and we can share profit for groupage containers.    • Freight Forwarding - "TCS" is the agents of WFN, World Freight Network in Kuwait. Having agents in 115 Countries worldwide in 5 continents. So we are capable to arrange good competitive rates from our partners worldwide.    • Cargo services - As a pioneer of innovative freight systems on Kuwait and in constantly striving to improve efficiency, "TCS" has added a number of new dimensions to the more traditional ones of clearing and forwarding, project cargo handling, air freight, packing and international removals.    • Warehousing - We have around 20,000 sq ft warehousing facilities in Kuwait free trade zone.
